casebody.data:
CARLE & MONTANARI, INC., Appellant, v. AMERICAN EXPORT ISBRANDTSEN LINES, INC. and John W. McGrath Corporation, Appellees. No. 229, Docket 31825. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued Dec. 12, 1967. Decided Dec. 13, 1967. F. Herbert Prem, New York City (Bigham, Englar, Jones & Houston), New York City, for appellant. M. E. DeOrehis, New York City (Haight, Gardner, Poor & Havens), New York City, for appellee American Export Isbrandtsen Lines, Inc. Martin J. McHugh, New York City (Joseph F. McGoldrick, James M. Leonard, New York City, of counsel), for ap-pellee John W. McGrath Corporation.

Before KAUFMAN, ANDERSON and FEINBERG, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

The judgment of the District Court is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Bonsai, reported at 275 F.Supp. 76 (S.D.N.Y. 1967).
